description: Implemented ADR-043 event logging dual-write system with local JSONL persistence and async Neo4j queue. System tested with 11 events, verified offline mode, and confirmed graceful degradation. All deliverables complete.

TASK-023.5 Event Stream Implementation Complete: Neo4j schema with multi-tenant isolation, dual-write event logger, session cursor management, and event-based context loading. All 4 agents completed successfully in parallel.

Completed Cloud Knowledge Graph sprint (PR #1 merged to main). Delivered production OAuth authentication with session-based polling, event stream session model (ADR-043), write dispatcher architecture (ADR-041), vector embeddings service on Hetzner, and comprehensive graph API infrastructure. 178 files changed, 53k+ lines added. Authentication tested successfully in production.

Completed Unified API Authentication sprint task. Deployed all Graph API endpoints (events, events/team, graph/documents/batch) to app.ginkoai.com unified domain. Converted from Vercel serverless to Next.js App Router format. Updated CLI default URL. Achieved 99% token reduction (93Kâ†’500 tokens) with <690ms context load time, exceeding all targets.
